import "./post.css" import {Link} from "react-router-dom" import postimg from "../assets/post.jpg" export default function Post({post}) { const PF = "localhost:5000/images/" return (
{post.photo &&( )}
{post.categories.map(c=>( {c.name} ))} JAVA C
{post.title}
{new Date(post.createdAt).toDateString()}

{post.desc}

) }
